name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Good News : Bible Verse Generator

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: It generates bible verses so you are on time with the Lord.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
I made this extension because I lack awareness in my faith and the bible. With The Good News, we can share awareness of Christ and his glory. 

This extension generates bible verses for all to enjoy. 

Current Features:
      -Copy(Add verse to your clipboard)
      -Zoom capability (For impaired vision) 
      -Dark Mode (For flexible visibility) 
      -Reset (For manually refreshing the page)

Thank you,

Isaiah Lowe Brown
